```{r}
library(SummarizedExperiment)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Import data

```{r}
se <- readRDS(file = "Ravel_2011_16S_BV_se.rds")
```

```{r}
colnames(colData(se))
```


```{r}
sample_metadata <- se %>% 
    colData() %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>% 
    rownames_to_column(var = "Sample") %>% 
    as_tibble()
    
```


```{r}
sample_metadata %>% 
    modify_if(.p = is.character, .f = as.factor) %>% 
    summary()
```
